name: Autonauts
summary: Autonauts Age of Enlightenment is here! Culture your colonists for the first time with automated art, establish ethical silk production, build a spaceport to export goods and resources to other planets, and achieve complete cultural transcendence - fully graduating your Autonauts career!
info:
